Product Description

Out of Sight Power

High performance

The OptiPlex 790, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving Micro chassis.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core CPU, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 790 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3GHz Storage: 500GB HDD Optical: DVDRW Port: USB 2.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 790 like DP port, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection.Support Dual display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 4th Gen Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 790 for each user’s needs.

Rebust storage and memory

The combination of key integrated components allows this computer to excel at work, home or school. DDR3 RAM allows for efficient multi-tasking, and abundant hard drive space provides ample room to store files, apps, music and movies.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 790 comes with DVDRW drive supports reading and writing DVD data.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 790 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

Dell 790 Intel I3 Dual-Core 3.3 GHz Processor

Product Description

Flexible design

Advanced performance and productivity

Available with Intel Core i5 processors, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, The OptiPlex 790 enables increased power and productivity.

Specifications Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 3.1 GHz Turbo 3.4 GHz Memory: 8GB DDR3 Storage: 1TB HDD Optical driver: DVD Port: USB 2.0, VGA, DisplayPort, RJ-45

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 790 like a DP port, a VGA port and an RJ-45 connection. Support Dual Monitor connection.

Powerful processor

Select from Intel Core i5-2400 3.1 GHz Turbo 3.4 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 790 for most user’s needs.

Robust storage and memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, 8 GB DDR3 memory with Strictly selected particles.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit Multi-Language English/French/Spanish Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

1 TB hard disk drive

The OptiPlex 790 comes with a 1T HDD so that you can store more photos, music and movies.

This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high-performance bar may offer Certified Refurbished products on Amazon.com.
